text: geudaedeul(midneun jadeul)eun inlyuleul wihae chulhyeonhan gajang hullyunghan gongdongcheloseo geudaedeul-eun seon-eul gwonhago ag-eul geumhamyeo hananim-eul midnola. man-yag seongseoui salamdeul-i mid-eossdeolamyeon geugeos-i geudeul-ege deo joh-ass-eul geos-ila. geudeul jung-eneun midneun jadeul-i iss-eumyeo geudeul-ui daebubun-eun geoyeoghaneun jadeul-ila
